class.name: NuGetInstallerStep
class.description: A [NuGet installer step](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/NuGet+Installer) to run nuget restore command

function.name: nuGetInstaller
function.description: Adds a [NuGet installer step](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/NuGet+Installer) to run nuget restore command @see NuGetInstallerStep

param.name: sln.path
param.description: Specify the location of a solution or a packages.config file.

param.name: nuget.use.restore
param.description: Select NuGet.exe restore or NuGet.exe install command to restore packages

param.name: nuget.excludeVersion
param.description: Exclude version from package folder names

param.name: nuget.noCache
param.description: Disable looking up packages from local machine cache.

param.name: nuget.sources
param.description: Specifies NuGet package sources to use during the restore.

param.name: nuget.restore.commandline
param.description: Enter additional parameters to use when calling nuget pack command.

param.name: nuget.updatePackages
param.description: Uses the NuGet update command to update all packages under solution

param.name: nuget.excludeVersion
param.description: Exclude version from package folder names

param.name: nuget.updatePackages.mode
param.description: Select how to update packages: via a call to nuget update SolutionFile.sln or via calls to nuget update packages.config @see UpdateMode

param.name: nuget.update.commandline
param.description: Enter additional parameters to use when calling nuget update command.

example.description: Installs all NuGet packages referenced in the Visual Studio solution file "my_solution.sln" including the pre-release packages. Uses the default NuGet tool version installed on the TeamCity server.
Installs all NuGet packages referenced in the Visual Studio solution file "my_solution.sln". Uses a custom path to the NuGet executable.
